sentences.sContent: ...a motley collection of vans, old buses, cattle trucks, and even a fire engine.
sentences.sCn: ...杂七杂八的一堆车，有运货车、旧公共汽车、运牛卡车，甚至有一辆消防车。

synos.tran: 杂色的；混杂的；五颜六色的

trans.tranCn: 杂色的；混杂的；五颜六色的
trans.tranOther: You can describe a group of things as a motley collection if you think they seem strange together because they are all very different
